TopicTitle: Change sound volume on a part

Articles.Content: Is it possible to add a volume level parameter to a certain part in a Module Manager patch? The launch clamp and decouplers are too loud and I want to reduce the sound level a bit, but see no parameter for the sound level. It uses the sound_decoupler_fire.wav file, but see no reference to that either (maybe plugin coded instead of in the part.cfg?).
